EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited to Our Honeywell Brunch - Paris Air Show 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reserve Your Seat Today!
Paris Air Show 2017 Honeywell Brunch
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Paris Air Show is only one week away. Begin your Paris Air Show experience with Honeywell and an exquisite brunch at a world-famous restaurant in the heart of the Bois de Boulogne. Senior leaders from Honeywell Aerospace look forward to connecting with you at this stunning venue.
Date: June 18, 2017 Time: 11am – 2pm Location: Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de la Grande Cascade 75000 Paris CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017ParisAirShow_BrunchInvite.html]]>
Limited seats are available!
Kindly RSVP by June 9, 2017. Contact us at aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> with any questions. Read about Honeywell Aerospace activities for Paris Air Show 2017 and more by visiting aerospace.honeywell.com <[[aerospace.honeywell.com]]>.
